alert.note: Alert for Dearborn; Ohio; Ripley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 2:34PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, SOUTHEASTERN RIPLEY AND SOUTHWESTERN DEARBORN COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 234 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Versailles, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Aurora, Versailles, Milan, Dillsboro, Moores Hill, Wilmington, Manchester, Hartford, Mount Sinai, Cold Springs, Farmers Retreat, Friendship, Versailles Lake, Cross Plains and Olean. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
